sentence: “TA, he’s a great coach,” Minkah Fitzpatrick told reporters in January.
author: Ethan Sears
title: Steelers promoting Teryl Austin to defensive coordinator after Giants interview

sentence: “He loves the game,” said free safety Minkah Fitzpatrick, who made All-Pro in his first two seasons under Austin’s tutelage.
author: Joe Rutter
title: Steelers officially promote Teryl Austin to defensive coordinator

sentence: Over the next three days, he plays European members Ian Poulter, Tommy Fleetwood and Matt Fitzpatrick.

title: Match Play format feels like a Sunday
